   pt      R           R_g

NLO (pi0) scales factoriz. = renormaliz. = pt. 
PDF: CTEQ5 (no change w/ other params.)
Frag. function: KKP
RdA: using NLO(nPDF)/NLO(proton-PDF)
RdA: using NLO(nPDF w/ extra small-x gluon shadowing)/NLO(proton-PDF)
